task: Develop a basic 'Pokémon' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Do the words need changing?'.
name: Critter Quest

branding_data.short_description: Embark on a journey to discover, collect, and train a variety of unique critters in Critter Quest.
branding_data.detailed_description: Critter Quest is an adventure game where players explore a vibrant world filled with diverse critters. As a critter trainer, players capture and train these creatures, each possessing unique abilities and characteristics. The game challenges players to build a powerful team of critters, strategically utilizing their skills in battles against other trainers. The game encourages exploration and discovery, with a focus on the bond between trainer and critters. While inspired by traditional monster-catching games, Critter Quest introduces new terminology and mechanics, creating a fresh and immersive experience.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
